content: add a purr-fect touch of charm to your home with this kitty caddy crochet pattern this adorable and functional cat-shaped organizer is ideal for holding yarn hooks toys stationery or even remote controls whether you re a cat lover or just love clever crochet this pattern is both fun to make and super useful pattern details * easy-to-follow instructions with clear stitch explanations * beginner-friendly with some basic shaping * finished caddy is sturdy enough for desk or craft room use materials needed worsted weight yarn 130 yards black 25 yards white 25 yards tan size g 4 0 mm crochet hook fiberfill yarn needle 15-mm safety eyes 10-mm safety nose peel & stick felt pipe cleaner 1 sponge rollers great for gifting organizing or just adding a little kitty cuteness to your space meow s the time to crochet something adorable and useful
